p: Virus binding assays were performed as previously described [ 23, 28]. Briefly, Vero cells were seeded in 6-well plates at a density of 2 × 10 5 cell per well. Pre-chilled cells were incubated with ZIKV-MR766 at MOI 1 with or without P. mauritianum extract for 1 h at 4 °C. Then, the virus input was removed and the cells were washed with cold MEM supplemented with 2% FBS. The samples were then submitted to RT-qPCR.
